snippet.title: [Archive] Pokémon Prism - Trailer (Fan-Made Game Mod)
snippet.description:
A project that I made promoting Season 3, Run 4 of Twitch Plays Pokémon, which featured the debut of the fan-made Pokémon Crystal mod: Pokémon Prism.  The game first went live on 9th October 2016 at 21.00 UTC.  The trailer went viral, amassing well over a million views, and after Twitch Plays Pokémon beat the game, it was planned for release on Christmas Day.

Two days before launch, an Australian law firm acting on behalf of Nintendo sent a Cease & Desist order to Pokémon Prism creator Koolboyman, and the official release was cancelled.

The trailer alone was around two months of hard work by myself, as well as additional footage captured by Deadinsky66, representing a game mod that had been in development for 8 years.

The source of Pokémon Prism was subsequently leaked and its development was taken up by a new team of developers, who continue to provide updates and patches.

Trailer by Kip, including footage captured by Deadinsky66.  Soundtrack composed by pigdevil2010.

Check us out on Reddit:

https://www.reddit.com/r/PokemonPrism/

https://www.reddit.com/r/twitchplayspokemon

https://www.pokemonprism.com
